field.label: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item below.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: Enter either: "Session Paper" or "Plenary Lecture".

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Enter : 2009
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter: York University

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter: Proceedings of the 23rd International Congress of Onomastic Sciences

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: Select: ISBN Enter: 978-1-55014-521-2

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select: "Article"

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter subjects provided by Prof. Wolf Ahrens!

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Copy abstract from article. Double check for errors in OCR. Add a separate abstract for each langauage in which the abstract is available.

field.label: dc.rights
field.hint: Enter: The following articles are © 2009 with the individual authors. They are made available free of charge from this page as a service to the community under the terms of the Creative Commons Attribution-Non Commercial-No Derivative Works license version 3.0. For full details go to http://creativecommons.org.licenses/ny-nd.3.0

field.label: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item below.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them below.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution below. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Digital Object Identifier [DOI]
field.hint: Entering a DOI will enable you to see alternative metrics for your article. To search for a DOI for your article, visit http://search.crossref.org/ DOIs must be entered in their longer form version (i.e. http://dx.doi.org/10.3389/fpsyt.2015.00047) to see altmetrics data.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter a standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item. If the item is a journal article, enter title of journal, iolume, issue, year and page numbers here. Example: Journal of the American Society for Information Science and Technology 59.8 (2008): 1331-46.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes below.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases below.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item below. Add a separate abstract for each langauage in which the abstract is available.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Enter the names of any sponsors and/or funding codes in the box below.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: Journal homepage URL
field.hint: If required by the publisher's policy on repository deposition, please enter the URL of the journal's homepage here.

field.label: Publisher's Website URL
field.hint: If required by the publisher's policy on repository deposition, please enter the URL of the publisher's homepage here.

field.label: Article URL (publisher's version)
field.hint: If required by the publisher's policy on repository deposition, please enter the URL of the publisher's version of the article here.

field.label: Publisher required phrase
field.hint: If the publisher requires a phrase or phrases to accompany the self-archiving of an article, please enter it here.

field.label: Author
field.hint: Put the primary scholar's name and click to add any additional contributors.

field.label: Date
field.hint: Enter the date.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the title of the item.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract if the item has one.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the item's citation details.

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: Enter relevant key words for the item.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the appropriate type for the item.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Author
field.hint: Enter the names of the author of this item below.
field.required: Please include the primary scholar's name.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Supervisor
field.hint: Enter the names of the supervisor(s) for the ETD below.
field.required: Please include the names of your supervisors.

field.label: Date of document
field.hint: Please give the date listed on the title page of the ETD. The Year is a required field.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases below. Each keyword or phrase has to appear in a separate box. Click on the "Add" button to create new boxes as needed.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item below. Add a separate abstract for each langauage in which the abstract is available.

field.label: Degree Name
field.hint: Choose the appropriate degree name. Please contact diginit@yorku.ca to add additional degree names.

field.label: Degree Level
field.hint: Choose the appropriate degree level.

field.label: Program Name
field.hint: Choose the appropriate Program Name. Refer to FGS controlled vocabulary for additional program names. Please contact diginit@yorku.ca to add additional degree names.

field.label: Rights statement
field.hint: Author owns copyright, except where explicitly noted. Please contact the author directly with licensing requests.

field.label: Author
field.hint: Enter the author name.

field.label: MRP advisor
field.hint: Please enter the advisor name(s).
field.required: You must enter at least one advisor.

field.label: Date of Graduation
field.hint: Please supply the expected month and year of graduation. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Title of MRP
field.hint: Enter title of MRP.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If your MRP has any alternative titles, please enter them below.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item below. Add a separate abstract for each langauage in which the abstract is available.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases below.

field.label: Primary language of MRP
field.hint: Select the primary language of your MRP. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Sponsorship Acknowledgement
field.hint: Here is your opportunity to thank any sponsors if applicable.

field.label: Additional descriptive comment or notes
field.hint: This is a catch all field for anything that you'd like to add. Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: Item description/type
field.hint: Automatically populated for MRPs - please ignore.

field.label: Degree level
field.hint: Automatically populated for MRPs - please ignore.

field.label: Degree name
field.hint: Automatically populated for Master of Arts MRPs - please ignore.

field.label: Degree Grantor
field.hint: Automatically populated for MRP - please ignore.

field.label: ASC Number
field.hint: Example: ASC01213 Please obtain your ASC number from the ASC Image Log. (dc.identifier)
field.required: You must enter a ASC Number for this item.

field.label: Accession Number
field.hint: Example: "1974-001 / 295 (1643)". Accession Number / Box # (File Number) If the item is SPCOLL, use the SPCOLL call number. (dc.identifier.citation)

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item from the negative envelope or file for prints using “ : “ between clauses. Examples from negative envelopes: “Yorkville village : Escaped monkey recaptured” “Yorkville village : on a Friday night "after 4" “ “Ronnie Hawkins : entertainer”
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them below.

field.label: Creator (author, photographer, etc.)
field.hint: Enter the names of the author(s)/photographer(s) of this item below.

field.label: Structured Date
field.hint: This field only shows up if you select the “Published” check box in the first YorkSpace/DarkSpace submission screen. THIS IS A STRUCTURED FIELD. You will need to enter your best guess for the data. Use the “Date (free text notes on date)” to describe your estimate, if applicable. Please give the date of physical item creation below. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't available. This field allows users to browse by date.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Date (free text notes on date)
field.hint: This field can be used to qualify your decision for your “Date of Item Creation”. Use this to fill in other date related information, such as date published, or dates that you are unsure of. You can use square brackes, circa notes, n.d. etc. becuse this is a free text field. Take care to describe what you're entering.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: If item was previously published, enter publisher name here.

field.label: Format
field.hint: Enter format-related information, take care to describe using RAD if possible. Example: 1 photograph : b&w negative ; 35m

field.label: Relation
field.hint: Example: "One negative (#4A-5) scanned out of 11 in assignment".

field.label: Forms part of (Name of fonds or descriptive info)
field.hint: If the item is archival, please enter the name of the fonds. Example: "Toronto Telegram fonds, F0477”. If the item is not archival in nature, enter the citation here. For example, if the item is a plate from a book, use this field to enter the name of the book.

field.label: Relation URL (URL for Fonds, or link to VuFind URL)
field.hint: As above, if the item is archival, please enter a link to the Fonds description. Example: http://archivesfa.library.yorku.ca/fonds/ON00370-f0000433.htm If the item is not archival in nature, please enter a link to the item in VuFind, if applicable.

field.label: Series name
field.hint: Use this field to group together exhibits. For example, by selecting: "York50Photos" you will enable this image to be browsed by the York50Photos series in YorkSpace. A controlled vocabulary is provided in this drop down list. To select more than one value in the list, you may need to hold down the "CTRL" or "SHIFT" key. Please email akosavic@yorku.ca to add another series name.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Please follow the following conventions: capitalize first letter, use plurals, order names by “Lastname, Firstname” unless it’s a proper name.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Describe the image in detail here.

field.label: Scope and Content
field.hint: This is intended as the “Scope and Content Note”

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Select the name(s) of sponsor(s) from the drop down box. To select more than one value, you may need to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key. Please contact akosavic@yorku.ca to add another sponsor to the controlled vocabulary.

field.label: Rights information
field.hint: Please select the appropriate rights information. Contact akosavic@yorku.ca to other options to the controlled vocabulary.

field.label: SMC/JAC/ASC Number
field.hint: Please obtain your identifer from the folder or item slip. Example: SMC0014
field.required: You must enter an identifier for this item.

field.label: Link to VuFind record
field.hint: Please copy and paste the VuFind URL for this record here.
field.required: You must enter a VuFind URL for this item.

field.label: Title (short)
field.hint: This is the title without the author's name added. Enter the Variant Title or Cover Title as it appears in VuFind. Do not include any square brackets.
field.required: You must enter a title for this item.

field.label: Personal author, Performer
field.hint: Enter each author in their own box. Do not include comma after first name. Do not include date of birth. If qualifier (ie. lyricist) is provided, enclose in square brackets with one space after name. Example: Bayly, Thomas Haynes [lyricist]

field.label: Published
field.hint: Copy publisher information exactly as it appears from catalogue record. Leave date intact.

field.label: Date
field.hint: Get from Publication Info. Only enter date if it exists and is not in brackets. Enter yyyy only. Example: 1889

field.label: Physical Description
field.hint: Copy directly from catalogue record.

field.label: General Note
field.hint: Make sure each note is entered separately (in its own box). Enter everything as it appears.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list below, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: #653 in Staff View
field.hint: Open "Staff view" in the VuFind record, copy from #653. Put each description (in between commas) into its own box. Capitlaize the first word in each box. Do not put a period at the end of the word.

field.label: Series name
field.hint: If SMC: select Sheet Music Collection If JAC: select John Arpin Sheet Music Collection

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select "Sheet music".

field.label: Rights information
field.hint: Please select the rights information so that this field is populated.

field.label: Name of fonds
field.hint: Ignore this unless provided in catalogue record.

field.label: Relation URL (URL for Fonds, or link to VuFind URL)
field.hint: As above, if the item is archival, please enter a link to the Fonds description. Example: http://archivesfa.library.yorku.ca/fonds/ON00370-f0000433.htm If the item is not archival in nature, please enter a link to the item in VuFind, if applicable.
